comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content: Anyone know if this memorial is still there?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/donshearman] An object of concern in 2009 - www.callanpark.com/?p=239

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This was August 1931 (before the Sydney Harbour Bridge was finished) - SMH 5/8/1931 p.14 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16798394 (illustrated with Governor Sir Philip Game at the unveiling). More about Douglas Grant - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/4899855945/]

comment.author: 70928529@N03
comment._content: The Memorial is still there though now there is a fence around it.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Second thoughts - I am not sure if this is the same occasion as the unveiling (see link above), as the camera angle is slightly different,  and Douglas Grant has different shoes on!
